S04n372:4: saddharmaguṇamāhātmyaṃ tena śrutvā sa bhagavān punaḥ |

S04n372:52: tatra taṃ saṃpratiṣṭhāpya rājā saṃmodito baliḥ |

S04n372:76: saṃsāre sarvadā bhadraṃ saukhyaṃ bhoktuṃ yadīcchasi |
S04n372:79: triratnaśaraṇaṃ kṛtvā ye bhajanti sadā bhave |
S04n372:85: evaṃ vijñāya daityendra saṃbodhiṃ yadi vāṃchasi |

S04n372:90: abhyarcya śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā bhaja nityaṃ samāhitaḥ ||

S04n372:139: evaṃ mahatfalaṃ matvā triratnaṃ sarvadā smaran |

S04n372:153: iti tena jagacchāstā samādiṣṭaṃ niśamya saḥ |
S04n372:157: bhagavan kīdṛśaṃ karma mūḍhena prakṛtaṃ mayā |

S04n372:159: hā mayā kudhiyā yajñaṃ tīrthikasaṃmataṃ kṛtam |
S04n372:161: aho bauddheṣu yaddānaṃ prakṛtaṃ tatphalaṃ śubham |

S04n372:177: sthānaṃ na vidyate kutra sthāpayeyamidaṃ vada ||
S04n372:178: ekaṃ nyastaṃ mayākāśe dvitīyaṃ ca mahītale ||
S04n372:179: tṛtīyaṃ me padaṃ kutra sthāpayethā tdaṃ vada ||
S04n372:186: iti satyaṃ mayā proktaṃ śrutvā sa saṃpraharṣitaḥ |

S04n372:198: mayā na śrūyate kvāpi jñāyate naivamuttamam ||
S04n372:202: sukṣatre dānasaṃbhūtaṃ naśrutaṃ na mataṃ mayā ||
S04n372:204: na jñātaṃ tattriratnānāṃ prābhajiṣyan sadā bhave ||
S04n372:212: satkṛtya śraddhayā gauṇyaṃ śrutvā bhajāni sarvadā ||
S04n372:213: tathā ya saṃgharatnānāṃ śaraṇe sarvadā sthitaḥ |
S04n372:231: tatkalaṃ śrīmahatsaukhyaṃ dadyān naiva tu saugatam ||
S04n372:233: dadasva śraddhayā dānaṃ bauddhaṃ padaṃ yadīcchasi ||
S04n372:234: evaṃ datvā sadā dānaṃ bodhicitto jitendriyaḥ |
S04n372:236: vrataṃ vinā na śudhyeta trikāyaṃ mahatāmapi |
S04n372:241: kleśotthito jagadduṣṭaḥ kradho hanti kṣaṇena tat ||

S04n372:259: vijñāya tvaṃ sadā sattvahitārthe cara sadvratam ||
S04n372:266: iti tena jagacchāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ niśamya saḥ |
S04n372:268: tataḥ sa balirālokya taṃ lokeśaṃ jinātjam |

S04n372:281: saddharmaratnasya ca nirmalāsya buddhātmajānāṃ ca guṇākarāṇām || 93
S04n372:283: yāvanti puṣpāṇi falāni cauvaṃ bhaiṣajyajātāni ca yānio santi |

S04n372:287: devādilokeṣu ca gandhadhūpāḥ kalpadrumā ratnamayāśca vṛkṣāḥ |
S04n372:294: ato mamārthaya parārthacintā gṛṇantu nāthā idamātmaśaktyā ||

S04n372:315: yanmayā paśunā pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ kāritameva vā ||
S04n372:328: apriyā na bhaviṣyanti bhaviṣyanti na me priyāḥ |

S04n372:342: puṇyamekaṃ tadā trāṇaṃ mayā tatraiva saṃcitam ||
S04n372:352: tadāhaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmi tasmin sthāne mahābhaye ||
S04n372:363: adyaiva maraṇaṃ naiti na yukta me sukhāsikā |

S04n372:368: ekākī kvāpi yāsyāmi kiṃ me sarvaiḥ priyāpriyaiḥ || 96
S04n372:370: iyameva tu me cintā yuktā rātraṃdivaṃ sadā |
S04n372:372: mayā duṣṭena mūḍhena yatpāpaṃ prakṛtaṃ purā |
S04n372:387: ityukte balinā tena lokeśvaro niśamya niśamya saḥ |
S04n372:388: sādhu sādhviti saṃrādhya taṃ baliṃ caivamabravīt ||

S04n372:391: rātrau yathā meghaghanāndhakāre vidyutkṣaṇaṃ darśayati prakāśam |

S04n372:393: tasmācchubhaṃ durbalameva nityaṃ balaṃ tu pāpasya mahatsughoram |
S04n372:394: tajjīyate'yena śubhena kena saṃbodhicittaṃ yadi nāma na syāt ||
S04n372:399: bahusaukhyaśatāni bhoktukāmairna vimocyaṃ hi sadaiva bodhicittam ||
S04n372:400: bhavacārakabandhano varo kaḥ sugatānāṃ suta ucyate kṣaṇena |
S04n372:406: kadalīva falaṃ vihāya yāti kṣayamanyatkuśalaṃ hi sarvameva |

S04n372:430: tṛptaṃ sarvasukhaiḥ kuryāt sarvāḥ pīḍāśchinatti ca ||

S04n372:437: atha yasya manaḥ prasādameti prasavettasya tato'dhikaṃ falam ||
S04n372:441: nādya cet kriyate yatnaṃ talenāpi talaṃ vrajeḥ ||
S04n372:443: eatān sarvān visaṃvādya kā gatiste bhaviṣyati ||
S04n372:444: manasā cintayitvā tu yo na dadyāt punarnaraḥ |
S04n372:450: ekasyāpi hi sattvasya hitaṃ hitvā hato bhavet |
S04n372:457: yadā kuśalayogyo'pi kuśalaṃ tvaṃ karoṣi na |

S04n372:471: sarve devā manuṣyāśca yadi syustava śatravaḥ |
S04n372:476: mativeśmani lobhayan jale yadi tiṣṭhanti kuta sukhaṃ tava ||
S04n372:478: mahārthasiddhyai tu samudyatasya duḥkhāni kasmāttava bādhakāni ||

S04n372:495: kṛtvā ca nārakaṃ karma kimevaṃ svasthamāsyate ||
S04n372:504: mithyā kalpanayā citte pāpāt kāye vyathā yataḥ |

S04n372:508: bhītebhyo nābhayaṃ dattamārtā na sukhinaḥ kṛtāḥ |

S04n372:532: māni śatruṃ vaśaṃ neti mānaśatruvaśāstu te ||
S04n372:533: mānena durgatiṃ nītā mūrkhā durdarśanāḥ kṛśāḥ |

S04n372:542: yena janmasahasrāṇi draṣṭavyo na punaḥ priyaḥ ||
S04n372:543: avaśyaṃ na dhṛtiṃ yāti samādhau na ca tiṣṭhati |

S04n372:560: tasmāt prājño na tāmicchedicchāto jāyate bhayam |

S04n372:571: prakāmaṃ saṃpariṣvajya kiṃ na gacchati nirvṛtim ||
S04n372:574: yadi na te'śucau rāgaḥ kasmādāliṃgase param |

S04n372:672: na nidrāṃ na dhṛtiṃ dvesaśalye hṛdi sthite ||

S04n372:775: jñānālokaṃ karoti praharati ca sadā doṣavṛndaṃ narāṇām ||

S04n372:782: svargāpavargaguṇaratnanidhānabhūtā etāḥ ṣaḍeva bhuvi pāramitā narāṇām |

S04n372:789: yā avasthāḥ prapadyante svayaṃ paravaśo'pi vā |

S04n372:839: ghnantu nindantu vā nityamākirantu ca pāṃśubhiḥ ||

S04n372:847: atyākhyāsyanti māṃ ye ca ye cānye'pyapakāriṇaḥ |

S04n372:1000: svaparātmahitaṃ kṛtvā bhuktvā saukhyaṃ sadā bhaveḥ |
S04n372:1070: mayā te hitamākhyātaṃ budhvā dhartuṃ yadīcchasi ||
S04n372:1082: tadā tasya suhatatrātā kaścideko'pi naiva hi |
S04n372:1084: tataḥ sa yamadūtena badhvā saṃtarjya neṣyate |
S04n372:1085: tatra paśyan sa sarvatra sarvān duṣṭān bhayaṃkarān ||
S04n372:1088: tān dṛṣṭvā sa paritrasto vikalo dīnamānasaḥ |
S04n372:1106: avaśyaṃ yatkṛtaṃ karma bhogyameva hi tatfalam ||
S04n372:1107: yattvayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tatfalaṃ bhuktamatra hi |
S04n372:1108: yadi na prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ bhuṃjyānaivātra tatfalam ||
S04n372:1109: dharmaste vidyate naiva tattrātā nātra kaścana |
S04n372:1114: adattamapi cāhṛtya bhuktam dravyaṃ tvayā balāt ||
S04n372:1117: paiśunyavacasā bhedaṃ suhṛdāṃ ca kṛtaṃ tvayā |
S04n372:1133: śīlaṃ te vidyate naiva kiṃcidapi ca saṃyame |
S04n372:1139: satkāraṃ bhajanaṃ naiva kiṃcidapi kṛtaṃ tvayā ||
S04n372:1141: smṛtvā nāma gṛhītvāpi na hi saṃsādhitaṃ śubham ||
S04n372:1142: saddharmabhāṣitaṃ kvāpi śrutaṃ tvayā kadāpi na |
S04n372:1143: sāṃghikānāṃ ca satkāraṃ kṛtaṃ nāpi kadācana ||
S04n372:1144: dharmagaṇḍīninādaṃ ca śrutaṃ tvayā kadāpi na |
S04n372:1145: kiṃcidapi na te dharme mano'bhilaṣate kvacit ||
S04n372:1146: tenātra dāruṇaṃ duḥkhaṃ tvayāptaṃ sāmprataṃ dhruvam |
S04n372:1147: yenaiva yatkṛtaṃ karma tenaiva bhujyate falam ||
S04n372:1148: iti tairgaditaṃ śrutvā sa pāpī paritāpitaḥ |
S04n372:1149: teṣāṃ puro rudannaivaṃ brūyācca niḥśvasan śanaiḥ ||
S04n372:1154: iti tatprārthitaṃ śrutvā sarve te yamakiṃkarāḥ |
S04n372:1155: taṃ badhvā yamarājasya purataḥ sahasā nayet ||
S04n372:1158: kimatra me upānītaḥ pāpiṣṭho'yaṃ hi durmatiḥ |
S04n372:1161: yatra karmafalaṃ bhogyaṃ tatrainaṃ nayata drutam || 123
S04n372:1163: iti rājñā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā te yamakinnarāḥ |
S04n372:1168: tathāpi taṃ mahāduṣṭaṃ jīvantaṃ taṃ samīkṣya te |
S04n372:1170: tathāpi jīvito naiva tyajet prāṇaṃ sa kilviṣī |
S04n372:1174: tena tasya mukhamoṣṭhau jihvā dantā ca kaṇṭhakam |
S04n372:1179: sarve te pāpino duṣṭā bhuṃjante narake vyathām ||
S04n372:1180: kaścittrātā tadā teṣāṃ nāstyeva tatra nārake |
S04n372:1185: duḥkhaṃ hantuṃ sukhaṃ prāptuṃ kartavyaṃ puṇyameva hi ||
S04n372:1186: puṇyena jāyate kvāpi durgatau na kadācana |
S04n372:1190: suśīlo saṃyamī dhīraḥ kṣāntimān vīryavān balī |
S04n372:1220: ityevaṃ prārthine tena balinā sa jagatprabhuḥ |
S04n372:1223: nāhaṃ sadātra tiṣṭheyaṃ bahu kāryaṃ mamāsti hi |
S04n372:1228: tattvaṃ yathā parijñātaṃ tathā kṛtvā samāhitaḥ |
S04n372:1229: bodhicaryāvrataṃ dhṛtvā sukhaṃ cara sadā śubhe ||
S04n372:1230: iti śāstā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā sa balirādarāt |
S04n372:1239: tathā bodhivrataṃ dhṛtvā prācaranta sadā śubhe ||
